name: Continuum
storyline:
Fight in the Battle for Humanity and become a Legend
Welcome to the year of 7351!
500 years ago, Humans were colonizing thousands of star systems in the vast frontiers of the cosmos. Humanity was growing incredibly fast without encountering any serious challenges. The homeworld, Terra, became the pearl of the Galactic Republic, representing an incredible combination of technological and aesthetic development of mankind.

After millennia of prosperity, humanity is on the verge of extinction. Many systems are destroyed or in isolation while the fate of Humanity's cradle is yet to be discovered.It is said that the Terra itself became the epicenter of events that destroyed the era of peace in a matter of days.

You - the heir of the once powerful colonization fleet, whose battle glory is now resembled by only 1 strike and reconnaissance frigate of the long forgotten times — the commander of which you are destined to become. Your journey in search of resources and revenge will take light years, all the while trying to unravel the chronology of events that led to the disaster and gathering the strike force to return the lost homeland.

The galaxy contains thousands of star systems and countless amazing and unique planets. There is a lot of activity out there with many searching for a fortune or a destiny. You'd have to face the consequences of the mistakes of the past on some of those planets and rediscover forgotten technologies. You will also be waiting for the capture and restoration of systems, the development of the plot and the search for ancient technologies of the golden era.
summary: Continuum - become a combat MECH pilot in a brutal environment of the galactic post-apocalypse. In order to survive you'd have to collect resources, search for lost technologies and improve your combat vehicle. Defeat powerful adversaries, survive and become stronger.
